ROM.Changelog:
So we're moving on to 2.3 beta for Atomic now. Here's a pretty generic changelog : - Merged android 8.1.0_r14 - February Security Patches - Added lockscreen option to pass swipe up unlock - Added recent panel settings - Clear all fab button and position - Performance: memory optimizations - Themed DUI dialogs - Themed suggestions card summary text - Fixed network mode bug - Battery saver qs tile improvement - Allow to disable qs footer warnings toggle - Fix some NPE's - Some performance improvements
Device Specific Changes:- - Offline charging fixed - Dt2w delay fixed - OTA fixed - Overlays update - Some small changes
